author: Soundczar
title: My First Set
review: I received this set for Christmas when I was six.  We built and rebuilt everything with the great piece variety.  With windows, fences, doors, trailor hitches, trees, wheels and the mid-seventies version of the mini-figs this set became cities, houses, cars, wagons, planes, ships and so much more.  It's variety really made for unending building and play.  Today's sets could learn a few things from old classics like this.
